quotes.quote: Sorry, but I hate people who act innocent but are actually opportunists.
But the truth is merely the majority of the living. It only revolves around their choices and actions and nothing more.

Our lives become a reality through the most meticulous calculations. Doing our best to continue living is a resolution ingrained in all of us. And this shapes the right future for us. You could say it is lifeâ€™s greatest mystery. I want to observe the destination reached by the many lives that are created.
While it takes time to recover from the loss of a loved one, having an opportunity to take your mind off things helps too.
Choose the best thing you can do now, in order to get a step closer to your dream.
